title.narrative: Fact-finding assignment conducted by Swedish Penitentiary and Probation Service
Fact-finding assignment conducted by Swedish Penitentiary and Probation Service

description.narrative: Detta är en kortsiktig genomförbarhetsfasintervention. Huvudsyftet är att stödja Svenska Kriminalvården för att utveckla ett projektförslag för att inleda samarbetet med Moldaviska Kriminalvårdsstyrelsen. Genomförbarhetsfasen gör det möjligt för Svenska Kriminalvården att identifiera och bedöma de behov som kan hanteras ytterligare och definiera villkoren för ett nytt projekt.

This is a short term feasibility phase type intervention.The main objective is to support the Swedish Probation and Penitentiary Service (SPPS) to develop a project proposal to initiate its cooperation with the Moldovan National Agency of Penitentiary. The feasibility phase will allow SPPS to identify and assess the needs that could be further addressed and to define the terms and conditions for a new project.

This is a short term feasibility phase type intervention.The main objective is to support the Swedish Probation and Penitentiary Service (SPPS) to develop a project proposal to initiate its cooperation with the Moldovan National Agency of Penitentiary. The feasibility phase will allow SPPS to identify and assess the needs that could be further addressed and to define the terms and conditions for a new project.
The result expected is a project proposal fully developed and submitted by SPPS to the Embassy in Chisinau by April 2022.

sector.narrative: Justice, law and order policy, planning and administration

tag.narrative: 16.3 - Främja rättssäkerheten på nationell och internationell nivå samt säkerställa lika tillgång till rättvisa för alla.
16.3 - Promote the rule of law at the national and international levels and ensure equal access to justice for all.
